WorkItem.Description: Gem is listed very low on the gems pane, yet is equipped in 4/9 gem slots.
WorkItem.Summary: Mage - Optimizer equipping low dps gems

Comments.Message: This is very strange. If I load the character and optimize at max thoroughness I get an improvement from 18166.88 to 18315.38 and the resulting character doesn't use any of those green gems. I've attached what I get after optimization.

That's strange, are you using the same version as me? (the latest downloadable WPF file on the download page). Also, when I load your file I get a score of 15000 something, that's bumped to 17967 (which is exactly what I had with my original file) after I optimize at max thoroughness but with the green gems equipped again. I don't get why or how you get 18166 by loading my file, it should be around 17967.
Ok, looks like the new download is an old version. On v4.0.19, I get your results.
